options.optiboxes.title: OptiBoxes Configuration
options.optiboxes.processOptiFine.toolti: If enabled, the mod will attempt to read/load OptiFine Custom Skies.
options.optiboxes.processMCPatcher.toolt: If enabled, the mod will attempt to read/load MCPatcher Custom Skies.
options.optiboxes.renderSunMoon.tooltip: Enable/disable rendering of the sun and moon.
options.optiboxes.showOverworldForUnknow: Will show the overworld skyboxes in unknown dimensions. Will not show in nether/end though unless a skybox defines it.
